caption:
The first season of All Work No Play is over and I already can’t wait for S2. Thank you so much for all the chaos and fun. 

I loved every insane second of it < 3 Don’t make us wait too long, please?? 

 [insert various prayers to content queen Marisha here]

summary: So earlier today I was thinking about how Caduceus doesn’t understand the concept of money early on and thought of comparing it...
body:
So earlier today I was thinking about how Caduceus doesn’t understand the concept of money early on and thought of comparing it to tea and somehow that made me think of him in a tub filled with tea and flowers.


Honestly im into it even though I don’t like tea.

tags: like i legit shuddered when matt said the word
body:
Critical Role 2 ep 7

So, not a weird and canibalistic sphynx, but a manticore. This creature used to give me nightmares as a kid. I hate manticores, they’re just scary.

summary: During this downtime i’m watching Campaign 1 again
body:
During this downtime i’m watching Campaign 1 again

I must say. Tary is such an underrated character. I fucking love him so much. I don’t even care about the way Sam left as Scanlan and i know people cared a lot about that but he fucking gave us Taryon Darrington

Samuel, i love you

Hi I'm Courtnay! Welcome to my Cosplay blog! Chaotic Good

summary:
Thank you for your support!
Something new starting December 4th! Friday night Twitch streams and a Ko-Fi cosplay! I’ll be...
body:
Thank you for your support!

Something new starting December 4th! Friday night Twitch streams and a Ko-Fi cosplay! I’ll be streaming progress on all my costumes but there will be one specific one you vote for that I’ll only work on while streaming! You’ll see everything from design and breakdown all the way to complete garments and wigs! And you can support progress for this costume by donating to my Ko-Fi! (Donations aren’t required to join in on the stream.)

Tallied the votes on Instagram and Twitter and the first Ko-Fi project will be Allura Vysoren from Critical Role!

@tsubasa__hime | Linktree

blog.name: pagerunner-j
blog.title: Page's Page
blog.description: fandom, fun things, and other nonsense

summary: And now, Caduceus (as asked by @notaficwriter): First impression: Oh, you darling boy. Impression now: Oh, you darling boy. I’m...
body:
And now, Caduceus (as asked by @notaficwriter):

First impression: Oh, you darling boy.

Impression now: Oh, you darling boy. I’m still interested to see where he’ll end up, though, if continuing to face the sorts of things he has, and where his personal journey will end up going. And it should be noted, of course, that he may be sweet but he is certainly not harmless….

Favorite moment: His talk with Jester on the boat: <3

Idea for a story: It’s early days with him yet, so most of this is still percolating, but someone on Tumblr not long ago posted about what it might be like if Caduceus the healer was the one who ended up needing tending to, and all I could picture was Caduceus with a cold, and Jester trying to figure out what kind of teas in his stash might make him feel better (as compared to which ones might be really fun to prank people with later), while Nott makes incredibly dubious suggestions from the sidelines…

Unpopular opinion: Not sure if I have one!

Favorite relationship: Team Cleric is so cute together. I also liked the chat he had with Caleb when Caleb gave him the periapt, and I really hope we get to see more of him and Yasha together. Side note: HE NEEDS TO MEET KIRI OMG.

Favorite headcanon: He would have been both bemused and amused by Molly, and probably somewhat judgmental about his more extreme qualities — and for that matter, Molly probably would have poked, prodded, and teased him a lot just trying to get a reaction. I also suspect that Caduceus’ insightfulness, as applied to Molly, would make Molly a weeee bit edgy. But ultimately there’s a really decent core to both of them, and I think they would have gotten along just fine.

(Send me a character! meme post + ask box)
